pr_title: Adds gate blocks, for additional raid protection

timeline.message: Add gates as additional defences against raiders, those are more sturdy and do not break as fast. Crafted by the mechanist

Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/origin/version/1.15' into raidoverhaul
